text: “Kodi suona kuti Allah zikumulambira zimene zili kumwamba ndi zimene zili m’nthaka, kudzanso dzuwa, mwezi, nyenyezi mapiri, mitengo, nyama ndi anthu ambiri. Koma ambirinso chilango chatsimikizika pa iwo. Ndipo amene Allah wamuyalutsa, palibe amene angampatse ulemelero; ndithu Allah amachita chimene wafuna
